ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 9
ygData.msgSnippet: The same applies to the bandit sisters.  Their necklaces read exactly the same, but there are four of them, and they are lore items. ...
ygData.messageBody:
The same applies to the bandit sisters. Their
necklaces read exactly the same, but there are four of
them, and they are lore items.

--- dlobdell <dlobdell@...> wrote:
> From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>
>
>
> Ive never done that lens quest, so i suppose you
> could try that. However often quest items are
> different with each item, however it doesnt show
> physicaly. For instance the jumjum quest in
> rivervale.. The jumjum dropped from Nillipus looks
> just the same, and its discription when right
> clicked is exacly the same as the jumjum bought from
> a npc, however when you try to use the boughten
> jumjum, it doenst work. The same theory may apply
> with trying to get the same lens over and over and
> using them all... just a thought...
>
> Wes Lobdell,
> Quote: +ACI-Hide not your Talents+ADs- they for Use
> were made. What's a Sundial in the Shade?+ACI-
> Benjamin Franklin
>
>
> It just says +ACI-telescope lens+ACI- and is
> stackable. I guess I could
> just kill her 4 times and hand over the lenses
> and see what
> happens. Never thought about that.
>
> - Chad
>
>
